@graph.name: Bulgogi Roasted Spring Veggie Bowl - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Bulgogi Roasted Spring Veggie Bowl. Korean Gochugaru blend roasted Cauliflower Mushroom Asparagus Bowl. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Recipe Easily Soyfree

@graph.name: Bulgogi Roasted Spring Veggie Bowl
@graph.description: Bulgogi Roasted Spring Veggie Bowl. Spicy, sweet Korean Gochugaru blend roasted Cauliflower Mushroom Asparagus Bowl. Vegan Gluten-free Nut-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 cup of other spring veggies like sliced radish or sliced fennel
2 tsp soy sauce ((tamari for glutenfree, coconut aminos for soyfree)))
1/2 tsp garlic powder ( and more as needed)
1.5 tbsp or more bulgogi spice (See recipe notes to make your own mix)
a dash of paprika for color
2 tbsp asian chili garlic sauce such as sambal oelek
sesame seeds and scallions for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Prepare 2 baking dishes by lining with parchment or greasing.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat the oven to 425 degrees F. Prepare 2 baking dishes by lining with parchment or greasing.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the veggies except asparagus to a bowl. Sprinkle the oil and soy sauce and toss well to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the veggies except asparagus to a bowl. Sprinkle the oil and soy sauce and toss well to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the spices and salt and toss well to coat. Spread on the large baking dish and place in the hot oven.
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle the spices and salt and toss well to coat. Spread on the large baking dish and place in the hot oven.

recipeInstructions.text: Chop tough stems of the aspragus and place in another baking dish. Spray oil. Sprinkle a a good dash of salt, garlic powder and bulgogi blend or pepper flakes.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop tough stems of the aspragus and place in another baking dish. Spray oil. Sprinkle a a good dash of salt, garlic powder and bulgogi blend or pepper flakes.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the asparagus dish in the oven after 20 mins of baking time. At this time, Move the other dish around.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the asparagus dish in the oven after 20 mins of baking time. At this time, Move the other dish around.

recipeInstructions.text: Check after 10 minutes if veggies are done to preference,, or continue to bake for another 5. Bake until the veggies are tender
recipeInstructions.name: Check after 10 minutes if veggies are done to preference,, or continue to bake for another 5. Bake until the veggies are tender

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the dishes from the oven. Prep the bowls with with greens(fresh spinach or lightly wilted), avocado and chile garlic sauce. Garnish with sesame seeds and a dash of lemon if needed. Variations: Add some rice stir fried in gochujang to make a Bibimbap bowl. Add some baked tofu to make it hearty.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove the dishes from the oven. Prep the bowls with with greens(fresh spinach or lightly wilted), avocado and chile garlic sauce. Garnish with sesame seeds and a dash of lemon if needed. Variations: Add some rice stir fried in gochujang to make a Bibimbap bowl. Add some baked tofu to make it hearty.

@graph.keywords: bulgogi inspired vegan bowl, korean gochugaru roasted veggies, Spring Vegetables, vegan bulgogi
